H0.text: John Sholto Douglas sponsored the rules for which sport in the 19th century. Boxing

H1.text: John Sholto Douglas sponsored the rules for which sport in the 19th century. Fencing

H2.text: John Sholto Douglas sponsored the rules for which sport in the 19th century. Wrestling

H3.text: John Sholto Douglas sponsored the rules for which sport in the 19th century. 拳闘

A4.text: The rules were published under the patronage of John Sholto Douglas, 9th Marquess of Queensberry, whose name has always been associated with them.
